class.name: ahand_controllers/StatePublisher
class.description: JointStateController publishes information such as the position of the joints.

class.name: ahand_controllers/JointImpedanceController
class.description: JointImpedanceController controllers each individual joint of the allegro hand with.

class.name: ahand_controllers/EmptyController
class.description: Outputs zero effort, this is to test gazebo dynamics.

class.name: ahand_controllers/ROSController
class.description: Listens to a command topic and applies the commands to the robot.
